name: Starlight Velocity
effect: [Main] You may play 1 Tamer card or 1 Digimon card with [Hybrid] in its traits from one of your Digimon's digivolution cards as a Tamer or another Digimon without paying its memory cost.
security_effect: [Security] You may play 1 [Koji Minamoto] from your hand or trash without paying its memory cost.
